attributes.action: Lower the age of mammograms to 30
attributes.additional_details: I'd like this to happen as I know a lot of people who have battled breast cancer, that could have been diagnosed sooner if mammograms were available at a younger age. We have smear tests starting at a lot younger age, and this could help others get diagnosed at an earlier point and make people feel more at ease knowing we have the checks we need. Please sign and help this happen. We all need to be careful and look for signs!! Let's raise some awareness!!
attributes.background: I'd like parliament to lower the age of mammograms for everyone, let people have mammograms from the age of 30.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open which you might like to sign:

Reduce Breast Cancer screening age to 30
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629001
